DOC.brief_summary: Loop electrosurgical excision procedure ( LEEP ) primary diagnostic therapeutic procedure employ woman high-grade intraepithelial neoplasia cervix . The procedure usually perform outpatient set local anesthesia . However , could associate significant pain anxiety . The aim study examine effect listen music procedure reduce pain anxiety .
DOC.brief_title: Music Listening Reduce Pain Anxiety During LEEP
DOC.criteria: Women confirm suspected highgrade intraepithelial neoplasia cervix Allergy local anesthetic agent ( lidocaine ) Pregnancy Previous major surgical procedure cervix ( conization , LEEP , laser therapy , cryotherapy ) uterus Using cardiac pacemaker history cardiac arrhythmia Neurological disorder affect perception pain History low urinary tract cancer Coagulation defect History drug dependence Lower genital tract infection Apparent invasive cancer cervix Hearing difficulty
